content: What's mine is everyone's, and what's everyone's is mine.
info: 万象馆建成庆典_主流程文本2

content:
Today!
After much effort, we've finally built our
Ecological Vitality Research Exhibition Hall—
info: 万象馆建成庆典_主流程文本2

content: Hoho!
info: 万象馆建成庆典_主流程文本2

content:
Ahem, alright...
Everyone's here.
info: 万象馆建成庆典_主流程文本2

content:
Well then, Mors,
From now on, you'll be in charge of the daily management and research at the Omni-Gallery.
Would anyone like to say a few words?
info: 万象馆建成庆典_主流程文本2

content:
Though my miscalculations caused quite a few hiccups along the way,
thanks to everyone's tremendous support,
the Omni-Gallery has finally risen from the ground!
info: 万象馆建成庆典_主流程文本2

content: Originally, <color=#8AAB4B>{homestar} Road</color> was quiet and empty... hoho... Until everyone moved in and started helping each other, then it gradually came alive with activity.
info: 万象馆建成庆典_主流程文本2

content:
And that concludes our celebration!
Feel free to explore the Omni-Gallery at your leisure.
Thank you, everyone!
info: 万象馆建成庆典_主流程文本2

content:
Hohoho~! Thank you very much,
Mors appreciates this romantic encounter with everyone.
info: 万象馆建成庆典_主流程文本2

content:
Finally, for those who want to take a commemorative photo,
get ready! Watch for the perfect moment and
press <color=#38b6c5>B</color> to snap a picture!
info: 万象馆建成庆典_主流程文本2

content:
In this short time,
we've completed the Ecological Vitality Survey,
and got an official Astralink name: <color=#97c344>The {homestar} Route</color>.
info: 万象馆建成庆典_主流程文本2

content:
<size=30>Unique in its morphological characteristics</size>,
<size=64>the Omni-Gallery, is now officially open!</size>
info: 万象馆建成庆典_主流程文本2

content:
Thank you for all your hard work lately.
Would you like to say something to everyone?
info: 万象馆建成庆典_主流程文本2

content: Let's work together to fill up the Omni-Gallery!
info: 万象馆建成庆典_主流程文本2

content: Now, let's begin the grand opening ceremony of the Omni-Gallery!
info: 万象馆建成庆典_主流程文本2

content:
Want to experience some special ecosystems,
Want to revisit magnificent wonders,
Want to learn some fascinating knowledge,
info: 万象馆建成庆典_主流程文本2

content: <size=30>What did he just say? Since when can dad jokes be used as collateral?</size>
info: 万象馆建成庆典_主流程文本2

content:
can all be satisfied in one go at the
<size=64>Omni-Gallery!</size>
info: 万象馆建成庆典_主流程文本2

content: But I promise you this much - I won't let the Omni-Gallery get yanked back up into the sky by that pesky "mini-world bubble" we worked so hard to pull down! I stake my dad-joke prowess on it!
info: 万象馆建成庆典_主流程文本2

content: Neighbors of <color=#8AAB4B>{homestar} Road</color>! It must be gravity that brought us together—this feels like destiny at work, all for the sake of science!
info: 万象馆建成庆典_主流程文本2

content: <size=30>Eh?! Are you saying dad jokes are a universal currency?!</size>
info: 万象馆建成庆典_主流程文本2

content:
Congratulations on the opening of the Omni-Gallery,
And may our <color=#8AAB4B>{homestar} Street</color>
continue to flourish and thrive...
info: 万象馆建成庆典_主流程文本2

content:
I, Mors, express my heartfelt thanks to you all!
Though life is full of uncertainties, I can't
guarantee there won't be any more hiccups in the future...
info: 万象馆建成庆典_主流程文本2

content: The Omni-Gallery is finally complete! I'm so thrilled!
info: 万象馆建成庆典_主流程文本2

content:
In my humble opinion, who better to speak on our behalf than <color=#d3b037>{me}</color>,
who has made such tremendous contributions to the Omni-Gallery's construction!
info: 万象馆建成庆典_主流程文本2

content:
Yes, yes, hoho...
Thank you so much, <color=#d3b037>{me}</color>!
info: 万象馆建成庆典_主流程文本2
